articles.title: Google Reportedly Testing Letting People Play Games on YouTube - IGN
articles.description: The WSJ reports that Google started internally testing a new service called Playables, which allows users to play games on YouTube.
articles.content:

articles.title: Multi-level analysis of the gut–brain axis shows autism spectrum disorder-associated molecular and microbial profiles - Nature.com
articles.description: Autism spectrum disorder (ASD) is characterized by heterogeneous phenotypes. Disruption of the gut–brain axis (GBA) has been implicated in ASD although with limited reproducibility across studies. In this study, the authors propose a framework to leverage mul…

articles.author: Stephen Luntz
articles.title: Nearby Star Cluster May Be Nearly As Old As The Universe - IFLScience
articles.description: We knew the globular cluster M92 was old, but these dates may force us to up the estimated age of the whole universe.
articles.content: A new technique has been used to estimate the age of globular star cluster M92 at 13.8 billion years, plus or minus 0.75 billion years. This is an almost exact match for the estimated age of the Univ… [+3712 chars]

articles.title: Humans' evolutionary relatives butchered one another 1.45 million years ago - Phys.org
articles.description: Researchers from the Smithsonian's National Museum of Natural History have identified the oldest decisive evidence of humans' close evolutionary relatives butchering and likely eating one another.
